ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "API" ), not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "Admin" ), text( SBU__c ) = "D&S", Win_Only_Opportunity__c == true , or( ISBLANK(text( ATR_Probability__c )), ISBLANK(text( Program_Go_Probability__c )) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Probability is required for Win Only opportunities.
